name: Java Fundamentals by javatpoint
description: This site teaches fundamentals of the Java programming language in an amazing and simplified way

name: Bro Code
description: This playlist contains all the fundamental concepts that every Java learner should know. Bro code teaches these concepts in a simple manner with visuals

name: DSA with TutorialsPoint
description: This site provides all basic and advanced lessons on DSA and Java with examples

name: Kunal Kushwaha
description: This playlist covers the DSA concepts with good number of problems as well as DSA exercises you solve on your own

name: Oracle java Tutorial
description: This is the official Java tutorial provided by Oracle, the company behind Java. It covers the basics of this programming language and provides comprehensive documentation on various Java topics.
